name: Realm Of The Robograndmas: Cookie Heist
name_original: Realm Of The Robograndmas: Cookie Heist
description:
In the far off year of 2014, somewhere in the dark expanses of the galaxy a cargo ship of the worlds most cutting edge cookie technology has gone missing. The distress beacon leads our hero to the site of a crash teeming with malfunctioning security droid robograndmas out for blood.

Controls

WASD - Movement

SPACE - Jump/Vault

RIGHT CLICK / F - Activate items

SHIFT - Run

C / CTRL - Crouch

ESC - Pause

Credits

Substandard Shrimp - Code and Design
MBRHIndustries - Audio and Design
